endpoints.description: Retrieve the current status of the entire network in real time.
Report a new network outage incident for immediate attention.
Fetch detailed performance metrics for the specified time period.
Schedule predictive maintenance tasks to prevent potential failures.
Retrieve a list of all network devices with their associated details.
Update the configurations or properties of a specified network device.
Retrieve active alerts and notifications related to the network.
Resolve a specific alert by its unique identifier.
Generate a summarized report of network performance and usage trends.
Execute a specific operational workflow for real-time network analysis.
